page.title: 14LONGFORGAN - KENNELS -
page.content: Living as we do, in close proximity to the busy dual carriageway Dundee-Perth road and only 6 miles from the centre of the city of Dundee, is very beneficial from the point of view of our business of boarding dogs and cats. Owners like the idea of their pets going into the country to be looked after while they themselves are absent from home. But, the continuous roar of the traffic from early morning till late in the evening is in stark contrast to the beautiful views of the fields, hills and trees seen to the North-West. Looking Eastwards, multi-storey housing on the skyline remind one how close Dundee has got to Longforgan in the last 20 years, and the main fear is, how long will the remaining 2 mile green belt remain in existence to protect the surrounding landscape for future generations.
